layers.name: Civic Mandate
layers.purpose: Anchor legitimacy through community ratified charters and consent frameworks.
layers.rationale: Update Plans 1, 4, and 7 emphasize shared civic governance and adaptive renewal.

layers.name: Physical Substrate
layers.purpose: Safeguard compute facilities, energy stewardship, and supply-chain provenance.
layers.rationale: Architecture overview highlights secure compute foundations and facility provenance.

layers.name: Data Stewardship
layers.purpose: Maintain provenance, consent, and epistemic hygiene across all data assets.
layers.rationale: Risk taxonomy stresses consent traceability ledgers and participatory audits.

layers.name: Model Development
layers.purpose: Ensure training rigor and evaluation transparency across models.
layers.rationale: Update Plans 4 and 7 add specification templates and adversarial coverage.

layers.name: Instruction & Control
layers.purpose: Govern personas, refusal logic, and AEIP intents with dignity safeguards.
layers.rationale: Update Plan 8 codifies Right-to-Opacity and refusal protections.

contextualTransparency.notes: Provide refusal stats; hide sensitive prompts.

layers.name: Reasoning Exchange
layers.purpose: Execute AEIP handshakes with temporal integrity and counter-signature assurance.
layers.rationale: AEIP protocol spec mandates five-stage handshake with ledger anchoring.

layers.name: Deployment & Integration
layers.purpose: Enforce runtime change control, incident transparency, and assurance cadences.
layers.rationale: Risk taxonomy links runtime drift mitigation to change gating and incident rehearsal.

layers.name: Governance Publication
layers.purpose: Coordinate external transparency, civic accountability, and disclosure cadence.
layers.rationale: Governance map lists publication controls; Update Plan 9 aligns with external standards.

layers.name: Policy & Federation
layers.purpose: Support civic partnerships, federation agreements, and policy overlays.
layers.rationale: Update Plan 13 outlines federation charter requirements and partner registry obligations.

contextualTransparency.notes: Display partner list with contact opt-outs.
